description.translate: Although prompt to counsel others, conceals his face in a strange way.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Morion des Lorth\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Bien qu’amène et prompt à conseiller ses congénères,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7dissimule son visage d’une bien étrange façon.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Although prompt to counsel others,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7conceals his face in a strange way.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7RES§a1\"}"]}}
